OG.activeHint: When toggled on this condition will affect the character
OG.advancedHint: Number of advances the character has made
OG.checkBonusHint: Enter the number of bonus dice (e.g. 1), use a negative number for a penalty (e.g. -2)
OG.commonHint: Common conditions are automatically added to the character sheet at creation
OG.displayAttTypeHint: This is the attribute the skill will be listed under
OG.gambleHint: Do not include bonus dice in the number below, this will be added automatically
OG.heat9Hint: Heat 9: All Enemies have 1 additional Feat Point
OG.keptHint: Location where the item is currently kept.  Double click to cycle through the options
OG.lockHint: Double click the icon to lock/unlock the character sheet
OG.magsHint: Number of magazines or ammo for single shot weapons
OG.name: Name
OG.optionalFeatsHint: Click on the diamond to toggle between 0 & 1
OG.restrictedHint: Restricted feats are only available on character creation
OG.selectNewItem: Click on the + icon to select an item
OG.shortDescHint: The short description will be visible on the character sheet
OG.skillPointsHint: Click on the relevant diamond to change the score
OG.startingAdrenalineHint: Click on the left battery to set to 1, or the right battery to set to 2
OG.startingBulletsHint: Click on the left gun to set to 1, or the right gun to set to 2
OG.startingExpHint: Click on the seal to toggle between 0 & 1
OG.startingFeatsHint: Click on the left diamond to set to 1, or the right diamond to set to 2
OG.tropeAttChoose: Please choose an attribute to improve

msg.bulletAdded: A bullet has been added to your death roulette gun
msg.deleteRole: Please delete the character's Role before deleting Age
msg.deleteTrope: Please delete the character's Trope before deleting Role
msg.dupAge: This character already has an Age assigned, you may not add a second one
msg.dupItem: Can't create this item as it already exists on the character sheet
msg.dupRole: This character already has a Role, you may not add a second one
msg.dupTrope: This character already has a Trope, you may not add a second one
msg.enemyItem: This item is not allowed for characters.
msg.maxSpotlight: You already have the maximum Spotlight
msg.noAge: You must select an Age before adding a Role
msg.noAgeDelete: There is no Age for you to delete
msg.noDropLocked: You can not add this item when the character sheet is locked
msg.noRole: You must select a Role before adding a Trope
msg.noRoleDelete: There is no Role for you to delete
msg.noSave: There are no characters to save
msg.noSpotlight: You don't have any Spotlights to spend
msg.noTropeDelete: There is no Trope for you to delete

settings.autoDRHint: Automatically add bullets on a succesful Death Roulette roll
settings.damageControlHint: Automatically reduce damage for rolled successes
settings.defaultCheckTypeHint: Select the default type of check for skill rolls
settings.defaultDifficultyHint: Select the default difficutly for Action Rolls etc
